name: Pasta Al Forno
description: Classic Italian baked pasta dish with layers of pasta, sauce, and cheese.
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Brown ground beef in a skillet with chopped onion.
Layer pasta, tomato sauce, ground beef mixture, and cheeses in a baking dish.
Repeat layers until all ingredients are used, ending with a layer of cheese on top.
Bake in the oven at 350Â°F for 25-30 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly.
